title: Bug 49299Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 says that custom cookie name affects URL rewriting
description: Bug 49299Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 says that custom cookie name affects URL rewriting
OB: The custom cookie name mentioned in Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 does not affect URL rewriting. Instead, the default 'jsessionid' cookie name is used.
EB: The expected behavior is that the custom cookie name should be used for URL rewriting as mentioned in Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Deploy the attached war file named 'cookiename.war'. 
2. Access the URL 'http://localhost:8080/cookiename/'.
